message: This is a great opportunity to get a unique product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a fantastic value considering its rarity. I'm sure you won't find another deal like this anywhere else. What do you say, are you interested?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see the actual quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that this product has a lot of potential. It's not perfect, but it's a great starting point for someone who's willing to put in the work to make it their own. And at $100, it's a risk-free investment. You can always try to flip it or repurpose it if it doesn't work out. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance?
I'm not convinced that the potential outweighs the risk. I'd like to wait for a higher-quality product or a better offer.

Ahah, I knew you'd be impressed! This one's a real gem, and I'm not surprised you're interested. At $100, it's an absolute steal. Think about it, this product is worth $120 to you, and I'm offering it to you for a song. It's a no-brainer, if you ask me. What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this incredible deal?
I'll take it! I'm willing to take a chance on this one, considering the potential value it could bring.

I knew you'd see it my way! You won't regret this purchase, I'm sure. But, I have to ask, are you sure you're ready to settle for just one more high-quality product? I have a feeling I might have something even better up my sleeve...
